original_title: Miss Patty Cake: God's Great Big World
overview: Featuring a fun-filled mix of catchy sing-along tunes, exciting games and captivating stories, this entry from Christian children's entertainer Miss Pattycake -- aka Jean Thomason -- is designed to teach kids important lessons from the Bible. Intended for preschoolers, this installment focuses on the basic Christian principles regarding creation, faith and God's relationship with mankind.
title: Miss Patty Cake: God's Great Big World
